about_the_game:
Guards II: Prologue is a short turn-based tactic game with extremely simple rules, but very deep mechanics. Study your enemies and their intents and swap two heroes to make a move. Sounds easy enough, but the game will keep you thinking through every click of the mouth you make.

Guards II: Prologue is a free primer for Guards II: Chaos in Hell. Wishlist the full game!

Protect the world of humans against the demon swarms in seven tough missions and defeat one cunning boss. Features:

  • Meet four heroes with unique abilities and skill trees (out of the planned eight).
  • Show your wit in a deep original turn-based battle system.
  • Get an edge with an item system full of spells, potions, and runes.
  • Travel through three different biomes with a unique bestiary (out of the planned five).

short_description: Lead a group of four fearless heroes into the depths of Hell. Sow chaos every turn, survive against hordes of evil creatures in five distinct biomes, and slay the Devil himself!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
